full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Supply Arrangement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites suppliers to submit a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for Subscription Agent Services. The purpose of this RFSA is to secure a Subscription Agent to provide subscription services, including acquisition, delivery, management, and support of publications in various media.

### Opportunity Description

Canada requires a Subscription Agent to act on its behalf in acquiring and managing subscriptions to various publications, including print and electronic content. The Subscription Agent will be responsible for providing access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

### Requirement Scope

The scope of the work includes:

*   Acquisition of subscriptions to publications in all media
*   Delivery, management, and support of subscriptions
*   Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform
*   Execution of all agreements with publishers and other relevant parties
*   Managing all subscriptions and related information

### Eligibility and Submission Requirements

The RFSA is open to suppliers who wish to provide Subscription Agent Services to the Government of Canada. New suppliers can submit a request to become a Supply Arrangement Holder, while existing qualified suppliers do not need to resubmit their bids.

### Submission Deadline and Contact Information

The submission deadline for the RFSA is March 9, 2029, at 2:00 PM. Interested suppliers can access the solicitation at the link provided below.

*   [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18746406?extsite=MTg3NDY0MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18746406?extsite=MTg3NDY0MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Contact Matthew Curran at matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for more information.

### Important Details

*   **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Location:** Canada
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
